extension.summary: Wake up a sleeping device (e.g. NAS, Server, etc.) using Wake-On-Lan
extension.description: Sends a WOL magic packet to a remote device using its ethernet MAC address and displays a notification if and when the device is available.
extension.disclaimer: Uses XBMC-builtin-command "WakeOnLan" to send the wakeup-packet, and the GNU-licensed "python-ping"-script to determine the status of the server. Please see the file "ping.py" for infos on the latter one.
